unittitle_ssm: Brooklyn, Manhattan, and Long Island lantern slide collection
abstract_ssm: The Brooklyn, Manhattan, and Long Island lantern slide collection consists of 235 lantern slides that primarily depict historic houses, homesteads, churches, schools, and other buildings located in Brooklyn, N.Y. There are also images of houses and buildings located on Long Island, N.Y. and Manhattan.
